A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The positive: 

The"new age" Jedi graphics were really good. The fight scenes were definitely cutting edge.

The negative:

The story had holes in it. If I were to use an analogy\, I would say that it was like taking a domino out of a line and the line discontinuing. There were so many questions that episode 7 created which episode 8 left unanswered that I left the movie completely unsatisfied. And it almost leaves me feeling unenthusiastic about the impending episode 9. 

The impact that this movie had on the franchise is kind of like the impact that Quantum Solace had on the James Bond franchise.
